original_title: A Senior CIA officer for 30 years confirms the psychological operations they use overseas were turned against Donald Trump and the American People to keep Democrats in power  — The Donald
article_summary: A retired senior CIA officer has confirmed that psychological operations used overseas were allegedly turned against Donald Trump and the American people to maintain Democratic power, sparking discussions about the repeal of the Smith-Mundt Act, which allows propaganda on domestic news and airwaves.</s>
